Articles.Content:
Bug encountered.

C'ant use EVA function on the top right of the screen.

Cause unknown.

This was tested on multiple pods, multiple location on multiple campaign save. The pod wasn't blocked. Pod has been tested alone, still couldn't EVA.

when you click on the EVA button it will flash but nothing happen.

(Video available on request)

FIX found: Exit save; Reset all settings; Load save; EVA Fixed
